about_the_game:
Play as an aspiring game writer and designer who dives into a business partnership with a rowdy crew of talented co-founders, aiming to conquer the indie game development industry through their shared stories, love, and relentless determination. Will you write your way to the top?

  • Nameable Protagonist
    Choose your main character's name or use the default name, "Alice".

  • Four Romanceable Routes
    Meet your talented yet rowdy co-founders and explore their industry-related stories, while also, experiencing love!
    (Four routes to choose from: the Game Producer/CEO, the Composer, the Programmer, and the Artist.)

  • English Voice Acting
    Hear the characters come alive with English voice acting! Do note that only the prologue will be fully-voiced, while the rest of the game will be partially-voiced.

  • Unlock CG Events
    Stunning special illustrations and heart-throbbing scenes with your love interest!

  • Choice Selection
    Determine the story's possible outcomes through your choices and level up your love interest meter.

  • Write your way to Success
    Progress through the story by passing target levels through our Writing Skill Event Gameplay! This also determines your route and add story variations.

  • Multiple Endings
    Your choice selection and writing skill progress affects your ending. Unlock them all and experience the game in its entirety!

Play as Alice (Renamable), the main character of our game.

And meet your team/love interests!

Demo Features

  • 18k+ word count for total content

  • 2 Endings

  • 5 CGs

  • English Voice Acting

Credits:

Izumi (The Dev) - Writer, Programmer, Art Director, Background Artist, CG Colorist, Graphic Designer, UI Designer, Marketer

In collaboration with:

  • Kuroaya Craft (テル) - Sprites and Character Designer

  • Ysa Sensei - CG Lineart Artist

  • Mingming.ix - CG Colorist

  • Hanabiem - Key Art

  • VPG Studio - Voice Acting, Casting, Voice Direction, Voice Files Audio Engineering

  • Limnological - Co-programmer of Writing Skill Event - Level 1

  • NetherTales - Animator for Pangarap Game Jam scene on Opening and Trailer videos

  • PeriTune - “Pop_Motivation” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 (Trailer Music and Main Theme)

  • CC Music, SFX, and BG Model Creators - listed on the game application's credits section
